DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety pharmacokinetic comparison Seoul Pharma 's orally disintegrating film ( ODF ) formulation sildenafil ( test formulation ) Pfizer 's `` ViagraÂ® ( sildenafil ) '' Film Coated Tablet ( FCT ) formulation ( reference formulation ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetic Comparison Sildenafil ODF FCT Formulations Healthy Korean Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: - Background : An orally disintegrating film ( ODF ) formulation sildenafil recently develop Korea . This formulation expect enhance dose convenience increase patient compliance yield pharmacokinetic profile comparable conventional film coat tablet ( FCT ) formulation . - Objective : The goal present study compare pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile newly develop ODF formulation FCT formulation sildenafil healthy Korean male volunteer . - Methods : This randomize , open-label , 2-period cross-over , single-dose study conduct 2 part . Eligible subject healthy male volunteer age 20 50 year within 20 % ideal body weight , equally divide part 1 2 . Each subject receive single -dose ODF FCT formulation sildenafil orally fast state ( part 1 , 50mg ; part 2 , 100mg ) , 7-day washout period formulation . Blood sample collect 24 hour . Pharmacokinetic parameter determine sildenafil active metabolite ( N-desmethyl sildenafil ) . Adverse event also evaluate base subject interview physical examination .
DOC.criteria: Eligible subject healthy male volunteer age 20 50 year within 20 % ideal body weight , With congenital abnormality chronic disease . Key exclusion criterion include : history cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , endogenous , gastrointestinal , hematologic , neurologic , hemorrhagic disease ; anatomical abnormality penis factor cause priapism ( e.g. , sicklemia , multiple myeloma , leukemia ) ; clinically significant finding routine laboratory ( serology , hematology , serum chemistry , urinalysis ) , ECG color blindness test [ 8 , 16 ] ; history hypersensitivity reaction PDE5 inhibitor include sildenafil ; use prescription drug within 14 day study potential interact study medication ; use substance could induce inhibit cytochrome P450 3A4 synthesis ( eg , St. John 's wort , herbal medication ) .
